note: Fine art for home & business: Paintings & prints shipped worldwide. Plein Air Surrealism, Animals, Portraits & Landscapes. Youtube for demos and tutorials. The main focus of my work is painting and drawing the farm animals and landscapes of England so you'll find plenty of cows, sheep, horses and goats looking out of the canvas at you. I also paint a range of other subjects and explore different styles including plein air surrealism. You can check out my website here: http://www.mikejory.co.uk
